io.vertx.core.net.impl

Class ConnectionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.net.impl.ConnectionBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramSocketImpl, NetSocketImpl

    public abstract class ConnectionBase
extends Object
    Abstract base class for TCP connections. This class is optimised for performance when used on the same event loop. However it can be used safely from other threads. The internal state is protected using the synchronized keyword. If always used on the same event loop, then we benefit from biased locking which makes the overhead of synchronized near zero.
    Author:
    Tim Fox
